review: This was a great purchase at a fantastic price (on cyber Monday). I am pleased with the speed and variety of programming that Amazon has put on the box. The voice search capability is great and works well... far superior to spelling out a program or movie letter by letter. In an update, I'd like to see a grid of programs and not a line of click through options. The only programming I could recommend would be VuDu.  Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase and would recommend it.
